subject: jUnit and Jakarta Commons Logging with log4j - LogConfigurationException
msgSnippet: Hello, Are there any logging dependencies between jUnit 3.8.1 and Jakarta Commons Logging?  It s been frustrating trying to get commons logging to play well
messageBody:
Hello,

Are there any logging dependencies between jUnit 3.8.1 and Jakarta Commons
Logging? It's been frustrating trying to get commons logging to play well
with a log4j implementation in WebSphere Studio Application Developer, and
it was even trickier to get JCL/log4j to work with Struts Test components.

In any event, our jUnit and jWebUnit test cases run fine when executed from
WSAD. However, the jUnit test cases fail immediately when trying to run
them as an Ant task. We are forking the task so the tests will run in a JVM
that is separate from Ant's JVM. The errors that occur are pasted below:

[junit] Running gov.state.oh.us.odjfs.buyin.test.AllTests
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec
[junit] Testsuite: gov.state.oh.us.odjfs.buyin.test.AllTests
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

[junit] Caused an ERROR
[junit] null
[junit] java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException:
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
org.apache.commons.logging.LogConfigurationException:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
[junit] at
org.apache.commons.logging.impl.LogFactoryImpl.newInstance(LogFactoryImpl.java:532)
[junit] at
org.apache.commons.logging.impl.LogFactoryImpl.getInstance(LogFactoryImpl.java:272)
[junit] at
org.apache.commons.logging.impl.LogFactoryImpl.getInstance(LogFactoryImpl.java:246)
[junit] at
org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.getLog(LogFactory.java:395)
[junit] at
servletunit.struts.MockStrutsTestCase.<clinit>(MockStrutsTestCase.java:82)
[junit] at java.lang.Class.forName1(Native Method)
[junit] at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:142)
[junit] at gov.state.oh.us.odjfs.buyin.test.AllTests.class$(Unknown
Source)
[junit] at gov.state.oh.us.odjfs.buyin.test.AllTests.suite(Unknown Source)

[junit] TEST gov.state.oh.us.odjfs.buyin.test.AllTests FAILED

I'm not familiar enough with the source code for jUnit, but it seems as
though that may be the source of the problem (I say that with humble
hesitation). If anyone is familiar with problems related to jUnit and JCL
with log4j, please post your insight.

Thank you!

Jeff
